newsitem.title: BRAZIL: Brazil bank, CIGNA to seal insurance deal.
newsitem.headline: Brazil bank, CIGNA to seal insurance deal.

text.p: Brazilian private bank Banco Excel Economico and U.S. insurer CIGNA Corp will announce on Thursday a joint-venture to invest in Brazil's booming insurance market, said a bank spokesman.
The joint-venture will have an initial capital of $20 million, he added. Further details on the deal will be given at a news conference at 1000 local/1300 GMT at Banco Excel Economico's headquarters.
Banco Excel Economico is among Brazil's 20 largest banks, focusing mostly on retail banking. CIGNA Corporation is one of the 10 largest insurance firms in the United States, the spokesman said.
